Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people who are trying to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate a device (like a string telephone) that the people are using to communicate.
The student can show that the device uses sound to send information from one person to another.
The student can use labels to explain how the sound travels through the device.
The student can show that the device is specifically designed to work over a distance by connecting the two people.
The student can label the materials used in the drawing to make the device, like string and cups.
The student can represent why communicating over a distance is important or helpful for the people in the drawing.
